strategy: Chaos Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Iron Warriors Core, Elite and Siege formations, as well as all Traitor Titan formations, have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Black Legion, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Iron Warriors Retinue
formations.units: One Iron Warriors Lord, six Chaos Space Marines
extraUnits: Replace six Chaos Space Marines with six Iron Warriors Assault Marines, six Dreadclaws: 50 points
Add two Iron Warriors Havocs: 75 points

formations.name: Iron Warriors Armoured Company
extraUnits: Replace six Chaos Vindicators with six Chaos Predators (50 points) or six Chaos Land Raiders (150 points)

formations.name: Havocs
formations.units: One Iron Warriors Lord, four Iron Warriors Havocs, two Chaos Land Raiders

sections.name: Iron Warriors Elite Formations
sections.description: One Elite formation may be taken per Core formation.

formations.name: Chosen
extraUnits: Replace two Chaos Rhinos with two Chaos Dreadnoughts, or two Chaos Siege Dreadnoughts: 75 points

formations.name: Tyrant Terminators
formations.units: One Iron Warriors Lord, four Tyrant Siege Terminators
extraUnits: Add up to two Obliterators: 75 points each

sections.name: Iron Warriors Siege Formations
sections.description: One Siege formation may be taken per Core formation.

formations.name: Iron Warriors Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Add one Iron Warriors Basilisk: 75 points

formations.name: Heavy Siege Tanks
formations.units: Two Chaos Typhon Heavy Siege Tanks
extraUnits: Add one Chaos Typhon Heavy Siege Tank: 125 points

sections.name: Dark Mechanicus Daemon Engines, Traitor Titans and Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

formations.name: Defiler Pack
extraUnits: Add up to two Defilers: 50 points each

upgrades.title: Iron Warriors Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Battleship
items.description: Replace the Devastation Class Cruiser with a Despoiler Class Battleship

options.description: Replace a Iron Warriors Lord with an Iron Warriors Warsmith
Replace a Iron Warriors Lord and its unit with a Daemon Prince
Add up to four Chaos Rhinos and/or Chaos Siege Rhinos
Add up to four Chaos Land Raiders
(No more than needed to transport the formation with no space left over)

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Chaos Dreadnoughts, or up to two Siege Dreadnoughts

items.name: Dreadclaws
items.description: Transport a formation containing only infantry units and Dreadnoughts in Dreadclaws (formation must be deployed on a spacecraft)
